section.name: ToDo
section.p: These best-practice examples and the according documentation are on ongoing effort in providing best material for learning software engineering techniques. As such, neither the examples nor the documentation will be ever "finished". As a team, we want to be transparent about open issues and problems we are aware of, and also show, what we are currently working on.

p.b: In case you find any problems, or you have ideas how to improve this project, please contact us and help us adding important point to this todo list.
